heading: Ethereum Gas viewer
summary: A app which tracks the ethereum gas changes in the last 24hrs.Data is cached in the backend using redis.

heading: DEX Frontend
summary: A frontend DEX swap component. Contains modal and wallet connection

heading: Better EthersJS Error
summary: Javascript module which gives better error reports when using ethers.js

heading: Foundry Project
summary: Solidity Projects built using foundry with industry practices

heading: Car Rental System
summary: A webapp which allows users to rent a car at their desired location. It connects lenders and rentrs.

heading: Uniswap-event-listener
summary: C# and JS assignment listen to events emitted by uniswap contract and display it.

heading: Wave-your-hand
summary: Diving into web3 by making a decentralised public space to send messages

heading: Weather App
summary: A simple web-app which allows users to check the weather of any city

heading: Chat Room
summary: A online chat application which allows users to chat with each others. It uses firebase for storing data.
